description: This file defines data models for assessments using Pydantic. It includes models for creating, updating, reading, and listing assessments, with fields for identifiers, timestamps, and related metadata.

classes.name: AssessmentBase
classes.description: Shared assessment fields, including title, course_id, and module_id.

classes.name: AssessmentCreate
classes.description: Payload model for creating an assessment, inheriting from AssessmentBase.

classes.name: AssessmentUpdate
classes.description: Payload model for updating an assessment, allowing optional fields.

classes.name: AssessmentRead
classes.description: Model for assessment responses, including timestamps and identifier.

classes.name: AssessmentListResponse
classes.description: Envelope model for listing assessments, including items, total count, and pagination.
